explains: n. 基础，基础材料；[矿业] 支柱，支承结构；支撑

sentences.en: Underpinning this success has been an exemplary record of innovation.
sentences.cn: 支持这一成功的基础是一次堪称典范的革新记录。

sentences.en: Governance is a key underpinning to the SOA life cycle.
sentences.cn: 在SOA生命周期中，管理是一个关键的基础。

sentences.en: I see finance as the underpinning of so much that happens.
sentences.cn: 我将金融视为诸多事物的基础。
